title: Linards Kumskis returns to Sigulda mayor seat
summary_full: On Thursday, 11 December, Linards Kumskis (Latvian Farmers' Union/Latvian Green Party), the incumbent deputy mayor, was elected as the chairman of the Sigulda Municipal Council, LSM.lv reports.
summary_public: On Thursday, 11 December, Linards Kumskis (Latvian Farmers' Union/Latvian Green Party), the incumbent deputy mayor, was elected as the chairman of the Sigulda Municipal Council, LSM.lv reports.
